alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN OKALOOSA AND SOUTHEASTERN SANTA ROSA COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM CDT... At 212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Bagdad, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bagdad, Navarre, and Navarre Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
